an8.36:1.3: Danamayam punnakiriyavatthu, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthu.
an8.36:2.1: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu parittam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu parittam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:2.2: So kayassa bheda param marana manussadobhagyam upapajjati.
an8.36:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu mattaso katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu mattaso katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:3.2: So kayassa bheda param marana manussasobhagyam upapajjati.
an8.36:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:4.2: So kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:4.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, cattaro maharajano danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, catumaharajike deve dasahi thanehi adhiganhanti—
an8.36:4.4: dibbena ayuna, dibbena vannena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena adhipateyyena, dibbehi rupehi, dibbehi saddehi, dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi photthabbehi.
an8.36:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:5.2: So kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:5.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva tavatimse deve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati—
an8.36:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:6.2: So kayassa bheda param marana yamanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:6.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, suyamo devaputto danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, yame deve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati—
an8.36:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:7.2: So kayassa bheda param marana tusitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:7.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, santusito devaputto danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, tusite deve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati—
an8.36:8.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:8.2: So kayassa bheda param marana nimmanaratinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:8.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, sunimmito devaputto danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, nimmanaratideve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati—
an8.36:9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa danamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, silamayam punnakiriyavatthu adhimattam katam hoti, bhavanamayam punnakiriyavatthum nabhisambhoti.
an8.36:9.2: So kayassa bheda param marana paranimmitavasavattinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.36:9.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, vasavatti devaputto danamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, silamayam punnakiriyavatthum atirekam karitva, paranimmitavasavattideve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati—
an8.36:9.4: dibbena ayuna, dibbena vannena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena adhipateyyena, dibbehi rupehi, dibbehi saddehi, dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi photthabbehi.
